title: Authentication Middleware
content: Using authentication middleware can prevent unauthorized users from accessing certain routes.

title: Use 'bcrypt'
content: The 'bcrypt' package offers a simple alternative to encrypt passwords in order to store them in the database by using hashing algorithms.

title: Setting the 'cookie' property of the session object.
content: By doing it we can stipulate how much the session will last. After the cookie is deleted, the user will have to log again.
